author: Rebecca Shabad
title: RNC chairwoman says voting by mail would undermine democracy
description: Republican National Committee Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel said Monday that the push by some Democrats for a vote-by-mail option would undermine American democracy.
content:
Republican National Committee Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel said Monday that the push by some Democrats for a vote-by-mail option amid the pandemic would undermine American democracy. 
McDaniel wrote in an op-ed published by Fox News that the GOP will always def… [+8430 chars]
